useCase.name: Create Vehicle
useCase.description: As an administrator, I want to create a new vehicle in the system.

preconditions.precondition: The administrator is logged in to the system.

mainSequence.step: Administrator initiates the creation of a new vehicle.
Administrator creates a new instance of Agencia.
Administrator creates a new instance of Furgoneta with parameters patente and pma.
Furgoneta creates a new instance of Vehiculo with parameter patente.
Vehiculo object is successfully created by Furgoneta.
Blindado object is created by Administrator.
Premium object is created by Administrator.
Coche object is created by Administrator with parameters patente, plazas, categoria, and blindaje.
Administrator registers the new vehicle Coche in Agencia.
Coche is added to the list of vehiculos in Agencia.
